title: Rescued
description: Kyo and Anna's story.... (Release date will be moved up sooner once book is ready)When I went into stasis sleep on my way to Mars, I never expected to wake up in a cage.I have no idea what happened to my crew. Alone and afraid, I think all hope is lost until I'm rescued from slavery by a Kitsune fox-like alien, name Kyo.Lost, and with no way to return to my home world, he says he'll take me to a planet that's safe.We're very different, but I cannot deny that I'm drawn to him in ways I don't understand.The more time we spend together, I begin to wonder: what would be like if I allowed myself to fall for him?**The title of this book was previously "Thread of Fate" and is now "Rescued"**
author: Jessica Grayson
